task_name: Protein DE Prediction from Expression Profile
description: Predict limma differential expression from protein expression across 21 plasma samples. Calibration task: tests whether ML can learn statistical significance patterns from the same data used by limma. Expected to be solvable by models that capture group mean differences.

input_spec.note: Transpose: proteins as instances, samples as features. Input overlaps with DE computation (intentional calibration design).

notes: Calibration task: input-target circularity is by design
Tests ML approximation of linear model (limma) decision boundary
High baseline performance expected; used as upper-bound reference
